DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project examine effect acute bout exercise child 's energy intake course day . Previous study adolescent adult show exercise effective decrease short-term energy intake , variability . Individual characteristic habitual physical activity psychological factor may influence effect exercise energy intake , factor yet examine . The investigator assemble multi-disciplinary team researcher , expertise eat behavior , exercise , psychology , clinical research order examine question . First , investigator examine difference energy intake lunch , snack , dinner meal response 30 minute impose exercise compare 30 minute rest . Second , investigator collect objective measure child 's habitual physical activity , child characteristic ( body composition , eat behavior trait ) , individual response control exercise bout . The investigator examine group individual difference energy intake response exercise . Twenty child ( age 9-12 ) test course three visit . The key outcome difference energy intake response exercise vs. rest . Secondary outcome include influence difference habitual physical activity , personal characteristic , response exercise bout child 's energy intake . The long term goal line research understand mechanisms behind interaction exercise energy intake . The translational potential research inform personalize childhood obesity prevention strategy child risk overweight .
